name: Merge Rainbow: Monster Friends
description:
The merge monster arena is wide open! This time, the Rainbow Friends squad will side with you against powerful enemies. Are you ready to hit the battlefield and lead your monster army to victory?

HOW TO PLAY
- Arrange your rainbow friends army on the battlefield
- Combine two similar Blue monsters or Orange monsters to evolve them
- Unlock new and more powerful rainbow monsters
- The more monsters you summon and merge, the stronger your army becomes
- Use wise strategies to beat enemy teams

Are you up for the challenge? Download Merge Rainbow Friends now and have fun merging!
